page.title: 15Transport
page.content: With the exception of Noke,the area is well served by Charlton on Otmoor Services,a privately owned bus company whose fares are very reasonable (50p into Oxford from Islip).The many people of the area who work in Oxford use this service regularly to go to and return from work.Others use it for shopping.Most people,however,own their own cars and it is quite common for a family to have two cars.There is a huge surge of traffic through Islip between 8 and 9 am going into Cowley from the Bicester area,and again about 5 pm returning.Congestion in the village's narrow streets is considerable,and the danger has obliged the school to establish a patrol to see children across the road.
